description: This is a great piece of software... but there is one big catch... it is out of date. While this would be a great piece of software if it was up to date, it isn't... so I can't really give this software a five star review... but from what I have seen, all the questions are correct for the time when this software was made.
Texted based the the question pool has not been updated.
Test questions are out of date.

As Jan/Feb 2021, T and G tests are up to date while E tests are out of date. 

Other than that, it is a great tool to prepare for the tests when I need to go through all the test questions randomly and completely. Thanks so much for the help from this tool to get my license.
summary: Pretty good and useful for test preparation
